This game is probably the most competitive shooter I've ever played, and for that reason I love it. I do however hate that the game is free as I believe it promotes cheating, and I think the focus on micro-transactions causes the developers to care more about the money and less about their people.
Gostei, porém, poderia ser mais otimizado.

Не советую играть в эту игру без прайма тем более. В принципе такая же помойка как и Fortnite, но Fortnite хотя бы иногда обновляется и большинство случаев в лучшую сторону, а эта игра была помойкой и осталась.
O que dizer do game? Excelente jogo, tem seus bugs como qualquer outro game, mas ainda sim é um dos jogos mais jogados do mundo.

As a person with over a thousand hours in this game, it has reached a boiling point. Since the developers decided to go free-to-play, the matchmaking is absolutely atrocious. Every game (EVERY) has either cheaters or smurfs. This game is no longer friendly to new players and isn't the same Counter Strike it used to be for the consumer. I really hate to be like this because this has been one of my favorite games of all time. But the developers are more concerned with micro-transactions than actual gameplay for the average player. Should you play this game? Yes. But it will not be the same Counter Strike of legend. It stinks right now. One out of every five games will be legit. I recommend downloading a third-party MM software like FACEIT or ESEA. Matchmaking at its current state is simply not worth anyone's time, even if you're playing it just to relax. Hopefully the devs change this but with their track record, I highly doubt it. Valve is becoming the next EA.
